### Put the OSG Servers into the database ### Set Default Public Names OSGgums="rocks-gums.&Kickstart_PublicDNSDomain;" OSGCE="rocks-ce.&Kickstart_PublicDNSDomain;" OSGSE="rocks-se.&Kickstart_PublicDNSDomain;" OSGGFTP="rocks-ce.&Kickstart_PublicDNSDomain;" OSGXRDLOCALREDIRECTOR="cms-xrd-transit.cern.ch+" ### Set Default Private names OSGCEPrivate="login-0-0" #if roll was installed at kickstart OSGCEPrivate should exist need for auto.osg if [ "x`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSGCEPrivate`" == "x" ]; then /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSGCEPrivate value=$OSGCEPrivate fi OSGSEPrivate="login-0-1" if [ "x`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSGSEPrivate`" == "x" ]; then /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSGSEPrivate value=$OSGSEPrivate fi OSGGUMSPrivate="login-0-2" if [ "x`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSGGumsPrivate`" == "x" ]; then /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSGGumsPrivate value=$OSGGUMSPrivate fi OSGGridftpPrivate="login-0-0" OSGGridftpHdfsPrivate="login-0-1"
### Set Default Bestman Configuration #rocks firewall requires "20000:25000" instead of "20000,25000" OSGglobusPortRange="20000:25000" OSGglobusTcpPortRange="20000,25000" OSGglobusTcpSourceRange="20000,25000" OSGSRMlocalPathListAllowed="/mnt/hadoop;/data/se" OSGSRMsupportedProtocolList="gsiftp://$OSGGFTP:2811" ### Set Default Storage Dir for Grid Certs OSGStoredCertsDir="/root/certs" ### Set Default GUMS Backup Dir and DNADMIN OSGGUMSBackupDir="/path/to/gums/backup" OSGGUMSDNADMIN="/DC=org/DC=doegrids/OU=People/CN=Name M LastName 123456"
###Servers #if roll was installed at kickstart OSG_GumsServer should exist if [ "x`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSG_GumsServer`" == "x" ]; then /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_GumsServer value=$OSGgums fi #if roll was installed at kickstart OSG_CEServer should exist if [ "x`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSG_CEServer`" == "x" ]; then /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_CEServer value=$OSGCE else OSGCE="&OSG_CEServer;" fi #if roll was installed at kickstart OSG_SEServer should exist if [ "x`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSG_SEServer`" == "x" ]; then /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_SEServer value=$OSGSE else OSGSE="&OSG_SEServer;" fi #other default servers /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_GFTPServer value=$OSGGFTP /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_XRDServer value=$OSGSE /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_XROOTD_LOCAL_REDIRECTOR value=$OSGXRDLOCALREDIRECTOR
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_GlobusPortRange value=$OSGglobusPortRange /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_GlobusTcpPortRange value=$OSGglobusTcpPortRange /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_GlobusTcpSourceRange value=$OSGglobusTcpSourceRange /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_SRMlocalPathListAllowed value=$OSGSRMlocalPathListAllowed /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_SRMsupportedProtocolList value=$OSGSRMsupportedProtocolList /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_StoredCertsDir value=$OSGStoredCertsDir /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_GUMSBackupDir value=$OSGGUMSBackupDir /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_GUMSDNADMIN value="$OSGGUMSDNADMIN"
# turn on OSG Client for compute nodes /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add appliance attr compute OSG_Client value=true # turn on OSG Condor Client for compute nodes /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add appliance attr compute OSG_Condor_Client value=true
###sample of how to set servers CE,SE,griftp # set OSG CE server #/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add host attr &OSGCEPrivate; OSG_CE value="condor" # set OSG bestman server #/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add host attr &OSGSEPrivate; OSG_SE value=true # set OSG gridftp server #/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add host attr $OSGGridftpPrivate OSG_GRIDFTP value=true
### Put the OSG_CondorMaster into the database CMaster=&Kickstart_PublicHostname; /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_Condor_Master value=$CMaster /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_Condor_Network value=private /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_Condor_Daemons value="MASTER" /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_Condor_PortLow value="40000" /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_Condor_PortHigh value="50000" /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_Condor_HostAllow value="+ $OSGCE" /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_Condor_Password value="no" /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_Condor_EnableMPI value="no" /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_Condor_EnableAMAZON_EC2 value="no" /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_Condor_EnableT3GRID_SUBMIT value="no" /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_Condor_EnableT3GRID_CMSSW value="yes"
# modify set of daemons running on master, login and compute nodes /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add appliance attr frontend OSG_Condor_Daemons value="MASTER, SCHEDD, COLLECTOR, NEGOTIATOR" /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add appliance attr login OSG_Condor_Daemons value="MASTER, SCHEDD" /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add appliance attr compute OSG_Condor_Daemons value="MASTER, STARTD"
# bind the network to the public interface on frontends.` /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add appliance attr frontend OSG_Condor_Network value=public
# parameters related with condor install /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_condoruid value=407 /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_condorgid value=407 # parameters related with CE install /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_tomcatuid value=91 /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_tomcatgid value=91 /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_gratiauid value=464 /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_gratiagid value=464 # parameters related with Bestman install /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_bestmanuid value=459 /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_bestmangid value=410 # parameters related with xrootd install /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_xrootduid value=460 /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_xrootdgid value=412 # parameters related with glexec /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_glexecuid value=463 /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_glexecgid value=463 # parameters related with squid-frontier install /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_squiduid value=450 /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_squidgid value=450 # parameters related with cvmfs install /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_cvmfsuid value=470 /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_cvmfsgid value=470 /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_fusegid value=408 # parameters related with rsv install /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_rsvuid value=5452 /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_rsvgid value=5452 /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_cndrcronuid value=466 /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_cndrcrongid value=467 /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_RSV_Port value=80 /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_RSV_SPort value=443 # parameters site especific /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_CE_Export_LocalDir value="/scratch" /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_CE_Mount_ShareDir value="/sharesoft/osg" /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_CE_DataDir value="/data/se/osg" /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_WN_TmpDir value="/tmp" /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_CVMFS_REPOSITORIES value="cms.cern.ch" /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_CVMFS_CACHE_BASE value="/var/cache/cvmfs" /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_CVMFS_QUOTA_LIMIT value=10000 /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_CVMFS_HTTP_PROXY value="http://login-0-2:3128" /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr OSG_CMS_LOCAL_SITE value=T3_US_OSG

#!/bin/sh
OSG_squiduid=`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSG_squiduid` OSG_squidgid=`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSG_squidgid` OSG_cvmfsuid=`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSG_cvmfsuid` OSG_cvmfsgid=`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSG_cvmfsgid` OSG_fusegid=`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSG_fusegid`
### Create the squid user #squid:x:450:450:squid management user:/home/squid:/sbin/nologin #always create squid user (makes sure /home/squid exist) createsquiduser=1 ### Create the cvmfs user #cvmfs:x:470:470:CernVM-FS service account:/var/cache/cvmfs2:/sbin/nologin #createcvmfsuser=0 ### This users are for backward compatibility (< rocks5.5) if [ "&rocks_version;" == "5.5" ]||[ "&rocks_version;" == "5.6" ]||[ &rocks_version_major; -ge 6 ]; then [ ${OSG_squiduid} -gt 500 ]&&createsquiduser=1 #[ ${OSG_cvmfsuid} -gt 500 ]&&createcvmfsuser=1 else createsquiduser=1 #createcvmfsuser=1 fi
#groups are completely exported! even in 5.5 (not filtered) /usr/sbin/groupadd -g ${OSG_squidgid} squid if [ $createsquiduser -eq 1 ]; then /usr/sbin/useradd -r -u ${OSG_squiduid} -g ${OSG_squidgid} -c "squid management user" -s /sbin/nologin -d /export/home/squid -m squid else touch /root/not_squid_user.log fi #groups are completely exported! even in 5.5 (not filtered) #provision for kvm roll (roll install fuse) if [ -f /bin/fusermout ];then /usr/sbin/groupmod -g ${OSG_fusegid} fuse yum reinstall fuse else /usr/sbin/groupadd -g ${OSG_fusegid} fuse fi /usr/sbin/groupadd -g ${OSG_cvmfsgid} cvmfs #always create cvmfs user #if [ $createcvmfsuser -eq 1 ]; then /usr/sbin/useradd -r -u ${OSG_cvmfsuid} -g ${OSG_cvmfsgid} -c "CernVM-FS service account" -s /sbin/nologin -d /var/cache/cvmfs2 cvmfs usermod -G fuse cvmfs #else #touch /root/not_cvmfs_user.log #fi
cp /etc/rc.d/rocksconfig.d/post-90-osg-server-frontiersquid /root/post-90-osg-server-frontiersquid.script_runned rm -f /etc/rc.d/rocksconfig.d/post-90-osg-server-frontiersquid

#!/bin/sh
### Create the tomcat User #tomcat:x:91:91:Tomcat:/usr/share/tomcat5:/bin/sh ### Create the gratia User #gratia:x:464:464:gratia runtime user:/etc/gratia:/sbin/nologin
OSG_tomcatgid=`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSG_tomcatgid` OSG_tomcatuid=`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSG_tomcatuid` OSG_gratiagid=`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSG_gratiagid` OSG_gratiauid=`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSG_gratiauid`
#groups are completely exported! even in 5.5 (not filtered) /usr/sbin/groupadd -g ${OSG_tomcatgid} tomcat /usr/sbin/groupadd -g ${OSG_gratiagid} gratia
### This users are for backward compatibility (< rocks5.5) if [ "&rocks_version;" != "5.5" ]&&[ "&rocks_version;" != "5.6" ]&&[ "&rocks_version_major;" != "6" ]; then /usr/sbin/useradd -u ${OSG_tomcatuid} -g ${OSG_tomcatgid} -c "Tomcat" -s /bin/sh -d /usr/share/tomcat&rocks_version_major; tomcat /usr/sbin/useradd -u ${OSG_gratiauid} -g ${OSG_gratiagid} -c "gratia runtime user" -s /sbin/nologin -d /etc/gratia gratia
#end backward compatibility ( <rocks 5.5) fi
cp /etc/rc.d/rocksconfig.d/post-90-osg-server-gridce /root/post-90-osg-server-gridce.script_runned rm -f /etc/rc.d/rocksconfig.d/post-90-osg-server-gridce

#!/bin/sh
### Create the Bestman User #bestman:x:459:410:Bestman SRM user:/opt/bestman2:/bin/bash
OSG_bestmangid=`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSG_bestmangid` OSG_bestmanuid=`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSG_bestmanuid`
#groups are completely exported! even in 5.5 (not filtered) /usr/sbin/groupadd -g ${OSG_bestmangid} bestman
### This users are for backward compatibility (< rocks5.5) if [ "&rocks_version;" != "5.5" ]&&[ "&rocks_version;" != "5.6" ]&&[ "&rocks_version_major;" != "6" ]; then /usr/sbin/useradd -u ${OSG_bestmanuid} -g ${OSG_bestmangid} -c "Bestman SRM user" -s /sbin/nologin -d /etc/bestman2 bestman
#end backward compatibility ( <rocks 5.5) fi
cp /etc/rc.d/rocksconfig.d/post-90-osg-server-bestman /root/post-90-osg-server-bestman.script_runned rm -f /etc/rc.d/rocksconfig.d/post-90-osg-server-bestman

#!/bin/sh
### Create the xrootd User #xrootd:x:460:412:XRootD runtime user:/var/spool/xrootd:/sbin/nologin
OSG_xrootdgid=`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSG_xrootdgid` OSG_xrootduid=`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSG_xrootduid`
#groups are completely exported! even in 5.5 (not filtered) /usr/sbin/groupadd -g ${OSG_xrootdgid} xrootd
### This users are for backward compatibility (< rocks5.5) if [ "&rocks_version;" != "5.5" ]&&[ "&rocks_version;" != "5.6" ]&&[ "&rocks_version_major;" != "6" ]; then /usr/sbin/useradd -r -u ${OSG_xrootduid} -g ${OSG_xrootdgid} -c "XRootD runtime user" -s /sbin/nologin -d /var/spool/xrootd xrootd #end backward compatibility ( <rocks 5.5) fi
cp /etc/rc.d/rocksconfig.d/post-90-osg-server-xrootd /root/post-90-osg-server-xrootd.script_runned rm -f /etc/rc.d/rocksconfig.d/post-90-osg-server-xrootd

#!/bin/sh
OSG_rsvgid=`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSG_rsvgid` OSG_rsvuid=`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSG_rsvuid` OSG_cndrcrongid=`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSG_cndrcrongid` OSG_cndrcronuid=`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSG_cndrcronuid`
### Create the rsv,cndrcron Users #rsv:x:5452:5452:RSV monitoring:/var/rsv:/bin/sh #cndrcron:x:466:467:Condor-cron service:/var/lib/condor-cron:/sbin/nologin
#groups are completely exported! even in 5.5 (not filtered) /usr/sbin/groupadd -g ${OSG_rsvgid} rsv /usr/sbin/groupadd -g ${OSG_cndrcrongid} cndrcron creatersvuser=0 createcndrcronuser=0
### This users are for backward compatibility (< rocks5.5) if [ "&rocks_version;" == "5.5" ]||[ "&rocks_version;" == "5.6" ]||[ &rocks_version_major; -ge 6 ]; then [ ${OSG_rsvuid} -gt 500 ]&&creatersvuser=1 [ ${OSG_cndrcronuid} -gt 500 ]&&createcndrcronuser=1 else creatersvuser=1 createcndrcronuser=1 #end backward compatibility ( <rocks 5.5) fi
if [ $creatersvuser -eq 1 ]; then /usr/sbin/useradd -r -u ${OSG_rsvuid} -g ${OSG_rsvgid} -c "RSV monitoring user" -s /bin/sh -d /var/rsv rsv else touch /root/not_rsv_user.log fi if [ $createcndrcronuser -eq 1 ]; then /usr/sbin/useradd -r -u ${OSG_cndrcronuid} -g ${OSG_cndrcrongid} -c "Condor-cron service" -s /sbin/nologin -d /var/lib/condor-cron cndrcron else touch /root/not_cndrcron_user.log fi
cp /etc/rc.d/rocksconfig.d/post-90-osg-server-rsv /root/post-90-osg-server-rsv.script_runned rm -f /etc/rc.d/rocksconfig.d/post-90-osg-server-rsv

#!/bin/sh
CEscratch=`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSG_CE_Export_LocalDir` CEshare=`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSG_CE_Mount_ShareDir` OSGCEPrivate=`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSGCEPrivate`
#if your ce is different from default you need to change $OSGCEPrivate to your current private ce here touch /etc/auto.osg [ "`grep -c \"^ce \" /etc/auto.osg`" != "0" ]||echo "ce ${OSGCEPrivate}:${CEscratch}/&" >> /etc/auto.osg [ "`grep -c \"^app \" /etc/auto.osg`" != "0" ]||echo "app ${OSGCEPrivate}:${CEscratch}/&" >> /etc/auto.osg
touch /etc/auto.master [ "`grep -c ${CEshare} /etc/auto.master`" != "0" ]||echo "${CEshare} /etc/auto.osg --timeout=120" >> /etc/auto.master echo "/cvmfs /etc/auto.cvmfs" >> /etc/auto.master
cd /var/411 make clean make cp /etc/rc.d/rocksconfig.d/post-90-osg-server-autofs /root/post-90-osg-server-autofs.script_runned rm -f /etc/rc.d/rocksconfig.d/post-90-osg-server-autofs

#!/bin/sh
OSG_condorgid=`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSG_condorgid` OSG_condoruid=`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host attr localhost attr=OSG_condoruid` /usr/sbin/groupmod -g ${OSG_condorgid} condor /usr/sbin/usermod -u ${OSG_condoruid} -g ${OSG_condorgid} condor chown -R condor:condor /var/log/condor chown -R condor:condor /var/run/condor chown -R condor:condor /var/lib/condor
if [ -f /etc/profile.d/java.sh ]; then . /etc/profile.d/java.sh fi /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add appliance attr login OSG_Condor_Daemons value="MASTER, SCHEDD" /opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host osg condor config &hostname; | /opt/rocks/bin/rocks report script | /bin/sh
cp /etc/rc.d/rocksconfig.d/post-90-osg-server-condor /root/post-90-osg-server-condor.script_runned rm -f /etc/rc.d/rocksconfig.d/post-90-osg-server-condor
